note: Since 2008, I’ve loved the idea of Twitter — what it was supposed to be. More and more I dislike what it has become, though. So let’s see if Mastodoesn’t make the same mistakes.

fields.name: I will talk about
fields.value: Board games. Software, apps, and digital tools.

fields.name: I may talk about
fields.value: Music. Twitter. Whatever is the topic of the day. Pictures I took. Rats.
